'''Archen''' ([[List of Japanese Pokémon names|Japanese]]: '''アーケン''' ''Archen'') is a dual-type {{2t|Rock|Flying}} [[Fossil]] {{OBP|Pokémon|species}} introduced in [[Generation V]].

It is resurrected from a [[Cover and Plume Fossils|Plume Fossil]] and [[Evolution|evolves]] into {{p|Archeops}} starting at [[level]] 37.

==Biology==
Archen is a small, bipedal creature with mixed reptilian and avian traits. Its large, red head is covered in discernible scales, and its neck has blue and red feathers. Its body is covered in untidy, sallow feathers, and it has blue, clawed wings that cannot be used for flight. It has short, thin legs, and a twig-like tail that bears a diamond-shaped blue feather. It has wide white eyes with black pupils and no irises.

Archen is extinct, but can be revived from fossils. It is believed to be the ancestor of all bird Pokémon, though recent research suggests otherwise. It hunts prey as they move about the forest. [[BW036|In the anime]], it was shown Archen does not like Pokémon food, but can grow a special plant with its cries. It enjoys the [[Berry|Berries]] grown on this plant.

==In the anime==
[[File:Archen anime.png|thumb|250px|left|Archen in the {{pkmn|anime}}]]
===Major appearances===
Archen debuted in ''[[BW036|Archeops In The Modern World!]]'', when a female Archen was revived by [[Fennel]] and [[Professor Juniper]]. She later evolved into an {{p|Archeops}} in the same episode.

===Minor appearances===
Multiple Archen appeared in the opening sequence of ''[[M14|Black—Victini and Reshiram]]''.

Multiple Archen appeared in a flashback in ''[[BW075|A Restoration Confrontation! Part 1]]'' and ''[[BW076|A Restoration Confrontation! Part 2]]''.

==In the manga==
[[File:N Archen Adventures.png|thumb|150px|Archen in [[Pokémon Adventures]]]]
===In the Pokémon Adventures manga===
An Archen is seen amongst {{adv|N}}'s Pokémon friends as he awakened {{p|Zekrom}} in ''[[PS504|The Cold Hard Truth]]''. He evolved before N challenged [[Alder]].

==Trivia==
* No other Pokémon has the same [[Egg Group]] combination as Archen and its {{p|Archeops|evolution}}.
* Archen is the only Pokémon with a base stat total of 401.
* Archen and its evolution are the only [[Fossil]] Pokémon without Hidden Abilities.
* Archen is the smallest and lightest [[Fossil|Fossil Pokémon]].

===Origin===
Archen appears to draw inspiration from ''{{wp|Archaeopteryx}}'', believed by scientists to be the earliest of all birds, also referenced by its species as the "First Bird" Pokémon.

====Name origin====
Archen is derived from ''Archaeopteryx'' or the geological eon ''{{wp|Archean}}''.
